author: felixweber
title: Cardano Ambassadors Catalyst Guild
description: Lacking communication, coordination & collaboration between the Cardano Foundation and the Catalyst Community/Ecosystem
solution: Building an Community led Team of Catalyst Experts to explore and execute initiatives between the Cardano Foundation &The Catalyst Community
experience: Cardano Ambassadors, Community Advisors, Proposal Mentors, SPOs, Funded proposers, Challenge Team members, Catalyst Circle members
